slide.name: What is present ?
slide.bullet: Present is tool to create presentations from text files.
The idea is to be able to edit presentations with a regular text editor.

slide.name: Why should I use present ?
slide.bullet: You want to keep the source of your presentation in source control.
You hate using a wysiwyg editor.
It allows many people to work on the same presentation at the same time and resolve their differences using common tools.
It separates content and presentation.
It forces same look and feel on all of your presentations.
Presentations look better because they are generated by machine and all the text is well aligned.
You can convert the content to many types: pdf, odp, html and more.
